pack.name: Cider QOL Changes: Alt BG #1 (Blurrier/Smoother/Frostier)
pack.description: Makes the background blurrier/smoother, resulting in a more uniform color

pack.name: Cider QOL Changes: Alt BG #2 (Darker/Duller/Layered)
pack.description: Makes the background darker/duller, resulting in a more distinct background

pack.name: Cider QOL Changes: Alt BG #3 (Accent-Colored Tint)
pack.description: Makes the background tinted by Cider's accent color

pack.name: Cider QOL Changes: Force Default Cider Button (Top Left)
pack.description: Forces the icon of the top left Cider Button to remain the default
